alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 8:43AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Beauregard, southwestern Vernon Parishes in west central Louisiana and east central Newton Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 843 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bon Weir, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Rosepine, Merryville, Bon Weir, Fort Polk, New Llano, Junction, Stringtown and Pickering. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southwestern and west central Louisiana...and southeastern Texas.
